CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK(TEXT( Preferred_contact_method__c )) = TRUE, 0, 20) + IF (ISBLANK( Email ) = TRUE, 0, 20) + IF (ISBLANK(TEXT( Nationality__c )) = TRUE, 0, 20) + IF (ISBLANK( Phone ) = TRUE, 0, 20) + IF (ISBLANK( MailingCountry ) = TRUE, 0, 20)
CustomField.label: Data Population Score
